title: sleep-debt-tracker
description: Sleep-debt-tracker is a project built with TypeScript, JavaScript, CSS, and HTML that helps users monitor and manage their sleep debt, aiming to improve their sleep habits. It utilizes modern web development techniques to provide a user-friendly interface for tracking sleep patterns and visualizing sleep debt over time.

title: devboard
description: Devboard is a Next.js 14 project built using TypeScript, React Query, and Material UI (MUI) that serves as a development dashboard. Utilizing the Pages Router, this repository showcases a structured and efficient approach to building modern web applications with a focus on clean architecture and leveraging popular technologies for data fetching, UI components, and type safety.

title: NextJs-Dashboard
description: NextJs-Dashboard is a project showcasing a modern and responsive dashboard built with Next.js, TypeScript, CSS, and JavaScript. It serves as a practical example for developers looking to implement a robust and visually appealing dashboard interface, demonstrating best practices in front-end architecture and utilizing server-side rendering for enhanced performance and SEO. This repository provides a starting point for building complex web applications with a focus on user experience and maintainability.

title: raven-v2
description: Raven-v2 is a project built with TypeScript and JavaScript, focusing on [mention the project's main purpose or functionality, e.g., "building a robust event tracking and analytics platform"]. Leveraging modern web development practices, this repository aims to [mention the key goals of the project, e.g., "provide a scalable and user-friendly solution for collecting and analyzing event data"].

title: robofleet-dashboard
description: The robofleet-dashboard repository hosts a web-based dashboard built with JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and Python, designed as a visualization and control interface for robotic fleets. Leveraging web technologies, this project aims to provide a user-friendly interface for monitoring robot status, task management, and overall fleet operations, making it a valuable tool for robotics projects and research.

title: finance-with-python
description: This repository contains a collection of Jupyter Notebooks implementing various financial analyses and modeling techniques using Python. It serves as a practical project demonstrating how to leverage Python's powerful libraries for tasks such as portfolio optimization, risk management, and financial forecasting. Explore different models and methodologies to understand and analyze financial data.

title: Map-Visualisation
description: This repository contains a project focused on creating interactive map visualizations using HTML and Python. It showcases techniques for displaying geographical data and building dynamic map interfaces, likely exploring methods for data integration and custom styling to present insightful location-based information.

title: jovian
description: Jovian is a Python-based CRUD application built with Flask, PostgreSQL, HTML, CSS, and Shell scripting. This project provides a practical demonstration of building a full-stack web application, covering topics like database interaction, backend logic with Flask, frontend design, and deployment techniques, making it a valuable learning resource for developers interested in Python web development and CRUD operations.

title: dynamic-event-calendar
description: Dynamic-event-calendar is a JavaScript-based project that allows users to create and manage events on a visually appealing calendar interface. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, this repository provides a customizable and interactive calendar solution for displaying and organizing events dynamically, making it suitable for personal scheduling or integration into larger web applications.

title: iot-asset-tracking
description: This repository hosts a modern IoT asset tracking web application built with Next.js, TypeScript, TailwindCSS, and Supabase. It leverages these technologies to provide a user-friendly interface for managing and monitoring the location and status of IoT-enabled assets, showcasing a practical project that explores the intersection of front-end frameworks and database management in the context of IoT solutions.

title: ros-log-viewer
description: ros-log-viewer is a web-based tool, built with JavaScript, Python, HTML, CSS, and Shell scripting, designed to visualize and analyze ROS (Robot Operating System) log files. This project aims to provide a user-friendly interface for filtering, searching, and interpreting ROS logs, making it easier to debug and understand the behavior of ROS-based robotic systems. It's focused on improving the debugging workflow for ROS projects.

title: next-voting
description: Next-voting is a full-stack voting application built with Next.js, TypeScript, CSS, and JavaScript, providing a modern and user-friendly platform for creating and participating in polls and surveys. This project showcases a practical implementation of web development principles and best practices, exploring key concepts related to user authentication, data management, and real-time updates within the context of a project-based learning environment.

title: genietalks
description: GenieTalks is a full-stack project leveraging TypeScript, Express.js, and the Gemini API to create an interactive and engaging application. Built with Vite.js for a modern development experience, this repository explores the integration of AI-powered communication within a web environment using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS for a dynamic user interface. This project serves as a practical exploration of AI integration and modern web development techniques.

title: resume
description: This repository contains the TeX source code and generated HTML output for my resume, serving as a personal project to showcase skills and experience. It utilizes LaTeX for professional formatting and generates an HTML version for online accessibility, demonstrating proficiency in both document preparation and web presentation. The repository allows for easy modification and updates to my resume, and serves as a template for others looking to create a similar digital resume.

title: next-idea-board
description: Next-idea-board is a collaborative project management tool built with Next.js, TypeScript, CSS, and JavaScript, designed to help teams brainstorm, organize, and prioritize ideas. This repository provides a visual and interactive Kanban-style board for managing ideas, making it ideal for project planning, personal productivity, or collaborative brainstorming sessions. It leverages modern web technologies to provide a smooth and responsive user experience, making it a valuable asset for teams looking to streamline their idea generation and project development workflow.

title: atg-world
description: ATG-World is a project showcasing interactive visualizations and data exploration, built using TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. This repository focuses on creating dynamic web experiences for presenting information, leveraging modern front-end technologies to provide a user-friendly and engaging interface. It aims to explore and demonstrate effective data representation techniques within a project-based context.

title: fruit-seller
description: Fruit-Seller is a fully functional e-commerce platform built with Next.js 14 (using the Pages Router), TypeScript, and React, leveraging MUI for a polished user interface and React Query for efficient data fetching and caching. This project showcases a type-safe approach to building a complete online store, encompassing product browsing, shopping cart management, and checkout functionalities, making it a valuable resource for developers learning modern web development techniques and e-commerce best practices.
